trans-unit.source: A persistence command that lets you save instance state information into the persistence store.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SaveWorkflowCommand"></xref> class.
To be added.

Sets the status of the instance in the persistence database to “Completed” and deletes the state information from the database unless the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceCompletionAction*> property is set to “Delete Nothing”.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the status of the instance is “Completed” and the state information is deleted; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the instance data to be saved into the persistence store.
A dictionary that contains names of properties and their values.
The dictionary that contains names of properties and their values.
Gets a dictionary with an instance key as the key and a dictionary of XName and <xref:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceValue> pairs as the value.
The dictionaries with key/value pairs.
Contains instance keys that must be associated with an instance.
A dictionary that contains a GUID associated with an instance key and metadata associated with the instance key.
The instance keys that must be associated with an instance.
Gets a collection of instance keys that must be disassociated with an instance.
A collection of instance keys that must be disassociated with an instance.
Gets a collection of instance keys to be deleted from the persistence store.
A collection of instance keys to be deleted from the persistence store.
Gets a dictionary that contains changes to instance metadata.
The changes to instance metadata.
To be added.
Removes the lock on an instance.
Sets the lock owner to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for an instance.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the lock is removed on an instance; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
